citeinfo.title: Point Locations of Landslide impact locations in NW Puerto Rico

descript.abstract:
Rainfall from Hurricane Maria triggered landslides in the mountainous areas of Puerto Rico. We are examining high-resolution optical satellite imagery to identify locations of roads, other infrastructure, and buildings impacted by landslides. We estimate the accuracy of impact locations to be approximately 100 m (328 ft) based on observed offsets of features in preliminary post-storm images from their locations in pre-storm images, presumably because of error in the registration of post-storm satellite imagery. That is, the point locations provided in the database are accurate to only within a 100 m (328 ft) of their actual locations on the ground. The inventory of landslide impacts is likely incomplete even for areas where imagery is available because some impacts may be obscured by clouds, vegetation, or shadows. The purpose of this report and accompanying geospatial data is to assist response and recovery efforts.
The geospatial database is comprised of polygons outlining the extent of currently available imagery, points showing the locations of landslide impacts, and polygons defining a 100 m (328 ft) buffer around point locations are provided as part of the geospatial database to provide information on estimated location accuracy. Points show the locations of roads and other transportation infrastructure, facilities and buildings undermined by landslides, buried in landslide debris, or otherwise impacted by landslides at the time of the collection of the satellite imagery.
The report and geospatial data are incomplete, but will be updated as additional imagery becomes available.
descript.purpose: To record the landslide impacts on NW Puerto Rico

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted.

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted.
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.
